Posts.Content:
hi, i have very dense breast tissue, i have had my right breast mastectomy and the left breast had a lumpectomy, i have triple negative ,her2 .once each year. 2013 and 2014, now i have under arm swelling called lympodema,for a year now, i am feeling a sore area under the arm ,i am going to have it looked at as soon as i can. i am scared .i was the one who found the lumps even after the mammograms,i told them something was there so i waited longer for them to check again ,it gave the cancer time to grow larger. that's what happens with the triple negative cancer. i hope your repeat mammogram comes out negative. 
i am so sorry about
 losing your husband to cancer,i believe in prayer!, i'll keep you in my heart for prayer, that is the only way we can survive this . p.s. i am also a new member here. lily
Posts.Title: Digital mamma call back - freaking out
